verbose_text: To investigate whether the increased production of TGF-beta alone may account for the ability of Smad7 -/- DCs to upregulate Foxp3 in CD4 + T cells, we tested the ability of Smad7 -/- DCs to induce Foxp3 in the presence of the TGF-beta-neutralizing antibody.
evidence: TGF-beta alone may account for the ability of Smad7 -/-  DCs to upregulate Foxp3
